caption.p: Additional file 9. Stage-specific apomictic vs. sexual differential expression analysis for antisense transcripts (DEATs). Section 1 (S1): premeiosis. Section 2 (S2): meiosis. Section 3 (S3): postmeiosis. Section 4 (S4): anthesis. IDs, transcript lengths, Log 2FCs, p-adjust values and NCBI descriptions (top hit) and GO annotations were included in the table. Positive Log 2FCs indicate overexpression in apomictic plants. Negative Log 2FCs indicate overexpression in sexual plants.
